title: Justice League

awardEventDetails.title: 2009 Nominee C.A.S. Award
awardEventDetails.for: Outstanding Achievement in Sound Mixing for DVD Original Programming
awardEventDetails.description: Ed Collins (dialogue and adr mixer) - Tim Borquez (re-recording mixer) - Eric Freeman (re-recording mixer) - Doug Andham (re-recording mixer)

awardEventDetails.title: 2006 Nominee Annie
awardEventDetails.for: Best Directing in an Animated Television Production

awardEventDetails.title: 2004 Nominee Annie
awardEventDetails.for: Outstanding Writing in an Animated Television Production

awardEventDetails.title: 2005 Nominee WGA Award (TV)
awardEventDetails.description: Rich Fogel (also story) - John Ridley - Dwayne McDuffie (For Starcrossed (2004), Starcrossed: Part II (2004) & Starcrossed: Part III (2004).)

awardEventDetails.title: 2004 Nominee Golden Reel Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Sound Editing in Television Animation
awardEventDetails.description: Robert Hargreaves (supervising sound editor) - Mark Keatts (supervising dialogue editor) - George Brooks (sound effects editor) - Mark Keefer (dialogue editor) - Kelly Ann Foley (dialogue editor) - Kerry Iverson (dialogue editor) (For episode "Twilight", part II.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2003 Nominee Golden Reel Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Sound Editing in Television Animation
awardEventDetails.description: Robert Hargreaves (supervising sound editor) - Mark Keatts (supervising dialogue editor) - George Brooks (sound effects editor) - Kelly Ann Foley (dialogue editor) (For episode "Savage Time", part 1.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2002 Nominee Golden Reel Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Sound Editing in Television - Animation
awardEventDetails.description: Robert Hargreaves (supervising sound editor) - Mark Keatts (supervising dialogue editor) - Kelly Ann Foley (supervising adr editor) - George Brooks (sound effects editor) (For episode "In Blackest Night", part II.)
